title: YouTube’s Susan Wojcicki steps down, leaving Big Tech with no female CEOs
description: She oversaw Google's video platform for almost a decade

title: Tesla issues recall of cars with ‘Full Self-Driving’ over crash risk
description: Tesla said it would issue an update over the air to remedy the “Full Self Driving” problems.

title: Tesla fires workers in response to union campaign, complaint alleges
description: Union organizers said in a complaint that electric carmaker Tesla sought to quash a union effort by terminating those involved.

title: PlayStation VR2 is exciting, exhausting and a new standard for VR
description: Still, the PS VR2 just doesn’t make a compelling case for the medium that other headsets haven’t already made

title: TikTok loves true confessions. Colleges, not so much.
description: Generation Z grew up online. Their ‘digital footprints’ on apps such as TikTok may haunt them.

title: Elon Musk reinvents Twitter for the benefit of a power user: Himself
description: Elon Musk has rolled out major changes at Twitter — many of which have targeted his own experience, but not that of millions of regular users of the site.
